DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe. The aim of this study is to investigate the self-reported impact of Vagifem® (estradiol) treatment on urogenital discomfort in women with atrophic vaginitis due to oestrogen deficiency.
DOC.brief_title: Vagifem® Used for the Treatment of Atrophic Vaginitis Due to Oestrogen Deficiency
DOC.criteria: Atrophic vaginitis due to estrogen deficiency Postmenopausal
